ch.nolix.core.endPoint

Class NetEndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.core.endPoint.EndPoint
        • ch.nolix.core.endPoint.NetEndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISender, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class NetEndPoint
extends EndPoint
    A net end point is an end point that can send messages to an other net end point that is: -on the same process on the local machine -on an other process on the local machine -on an other machine
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetEndPoint(int port)
      Creates a new net end point that will connect to the given port on the local machine.
      NetEndPoint(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      Creates a new net end point that will connect to the given port on the machine with the given ip.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

        Throws:
